title: Bobby and Mike D Share Details on Wedding Vows + Amy May Be Expanding Her Family Soon + Lunchbox Tried To Get VIP Treatment
itunes:title: Bobby and Mike D Share Details on Wedding Vows + Amy May Be Expanding Her Family Soon + Lunchbox Tried To Get VIP Treatment
description:
Bobby gives us some wedding updates including how he is planning on writing his own vows and some ideas that got shut down that he wanted to do. Amy tells us that she is considering adding a member to her family. Lunchbox tried to get VIP treatment out in public…we'll hear if it actually worked.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
